Have an Idea or Topic in Mind?
We welcome collaboration and guest contributions on topics around urban planning, sustainability, and engineering innovation.
Contact Us

title: About Nexus & StayGIS
text:
Nexus Engineering & Planning Ltd. (Nigeria) delivers innovative solutions for urban development and sustainable infrastructure across Africa. In partnership with our US affiliate, StayGIS LLC, we harness geospatial tools to drive data-informed decisions.
This blog shares quick reads, interactive maps, and behind-the-scenes methods for urban planners, policymakers, and civic-tech enthusiasts.

title: Nigeria @ 65: Relief, Coastlines, Cities
text:
This interactive map series explores Nigeria’s urban and geographic evolution over 65 years. Below is a sample map showing night lights growth (1992–2023). More layers on elevation and coastlines coming soon.




Data: VIIRS Night Lights, OpenStreetMap, GADM.
